long_description: The Petzl Universo belay system includes a Verso belay device and an Attache 3D carabiner with sliding connection piece that keeps the belay device and carabiner properly oriented. Connection piece on the Attache 3D carabiner allows the Verso belay device to remain in position and the carabiner to stay properly oriented along its major axis. Connection piece also limits the chance of dropping your belay device during rope changes. Verso belay device features V-shaped channels that increase friction on thin ropes; works with twin ropes, half ropes and single ropes. Verso is compatible with twin ropes 7.5mm in diameter and larger, half ropes 8mm in diameter and larger and single ropes 8.9mm in diameter and larger. Attache 3D screwgate carabiner features a key lock nose that won't snag. Manual screwgate system features a red band indicator to show when the carabiner is unlocked, providing a quick visual safety check. The Petzl Universo belay system is quick and easy to install on a rope.
